row.short_description: Enjoy easy-wearing comfort with the Skechers Flex Appeal 4.0 - Simple Joy shoe. This slip-on Stretch Fit® sneaker features an engineered mesh upper with a cushioned Air-Cooled Memory Foam® insole and breathable Breeze Tech™ panels.

row.name: GLIDE-STEP SPORT - LIVELY GLO
row.short_description: Enjoy brisk walks in flexible comfort with the Skechers Glide-Step™ Sport - Lively Glow shoe. This Stretch Fit® slip-on sneaker features an engineered knit upper with an Air-Cooled Memory Foam® comfort insole and Glide-Step™ geometric cushioned midsole.

row.name: SKECH-AIR DYNAMIGHT-RADIANT C
row.short_description: Take a walk in cushioned air comfort wearing the Skech-Air Dynamight - Radiant Choice shoe. This sporty lace-up sneaker features a breathable athletic mesh upper with Memory Foam comfort insole and Skech-Air® air-cushioned, shock-absorbing midsole.

row.name: UNO 2 - 2ND BEST
row.short_description: Get into the next big thing in style and comfort with the Skechers Street Uno 2 - 2nd Best shoe. This lace-up sneaker features a synthetic 'duraleather' upper, Air-Cooled Memory Foam® insole, and a platform wedge with visible Skech-Air® air-cushioned midsole.

row.name: RESPECTED - CATEL
row.short_description: Earn some serious style cred and stay fully comfortable wearing the Skechers Respected - Loleto shoe. This casual Relaxed Fit® slip-on features a smooth oiled leather upper with a cushioned Air-Cooled Memory Foam® insole and Goodyear® rubber traction sole.

row.name: DELSON 3.0 - MOONEY
row.short_description: A versatile look keeps it cool and comfortable in the Skechers Street Wear™ Delson 3.0 - Mooney shoe. This Classic Fit slip-on sneaker features a knit fabric and smooth synthetic upper with an Air-Cooled Memory Foam® insole and Goga Mat Arch cushioning for added support.

row.name: CROWDER-COLTON
row.short_description: Casual sporty style and comfort delivers in the Skechers Street Wear™ Crowder - Colton shoe. This Relaxed Fit® slip-on sneaker features a synthetic and athletic mesh upper with an Air-Cooled Memory Foam® cushioned insole.

row.name: CROWDER - ARMEL
row.short_description: Walk in sporty easy-to-wear comfort with the Skechers Crowder - Armel shoe. This Relaxed Fit® slip-on sneaker features a breathable athletic mesh upper with a cushioned Air-Cooled Memory Foam® insole.

row.name: GO WALK 5 - BEELINE
row.short_description: Cushioned comfort and easy-wearing style combine in the Skechers GOwalk 5™ - Beeline shoe. This sporty slip-on sneaker features a breathable athletic mesh upper with a synthetic overlay, Air-Cooled Goga Mat™ comfort insole, a lightweight ULTRA GO® cushioned midsole and high-rebound Comfort Pillar Technology® for added support.

row.name: GO CONSISTENT SANDAL
row.short_description: A sporty comfort essential delivers in the Skechers GO Consistent Sandal. This athletic comfort slide sandal features a Goga Mat cushioned footbed and cushioned ULTRA LIGHT midsole.

row.name: SKECHERS STREET FLEX - ELIMIN
row.short_description: Feel free to flex on the competition in athletic style and comfort wearing the Skechers Street Flex - Eliminator shoe. Sleek sporty mesh fabric and synthetic upper in a lace up athletic training sneaker with stitching and overlay accents. Air-Cooled Memory Foam insole, Goodyear® Rubber outsole

row.name: SPARKLE RAYZ-UNICORN MOONDUST
row.short_description: Magical style is hers to behold wearing the SKECHERS Twinkle Toes: Sparkle Rayz - Unicorn Moondust shoe. Soft canvas fabric and glitter finish fabric upper in a strap front casual light up sneaker with colorful ombre design and unicorn detailing.
